title: PBE Wont let me sign up
body:
So, I know that you have to be a valid player, I play a ton (a lot) and I main supports, but, when I goto the link for the signup, we know the infamous "I want to help" button. When I click it, nothing loads. It shows that my (desktop) PC is trying to load it, but won't. So as far as I know, It might be my browser (google chrome) or where I am. (NA, North America). Anyone have any advice? 

Edit: @Riot

C'mon Rito! Tell me if it's a bug with my part or if anyone else is having trouble.

Edit 2: I was looking and saw @Targon Embrace  try to solve this problem for others and it worked, but not for me. The blitzcrank error message pops up (error 500) and he said to use a VPN network, which I have no idea how to use. I cleared my cookies and everything! But nothing works.

Edit 3: Player support will figure it out...most likely.

replies.body:
Ohai~

Are you still having problems with this page? A number of players have reached out to let me know that the page isn't throwing the 500 error at them anymore, so I'd double-check to see if this was solved for you as well.

Please let me know!

Nope! It works. I sent a message to player support and they said they were working on a fix and it's out now. Thanks for your time anyways though!

Edit 1:..just..got 4 A+ in a row..as {{champion:16}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} ....I NEED 2 S's ..for mastery 6. Im going to kill myself.
